snippet: Six of Mr. King’s early novels, including “Carrie,” “The Shining” and “The Stand,” will be issued in limited numbers, with new art and introductions.
abstract: Six of Mr. King’s early novels, including “Carrie,” “The Shining” and “The Stand,” will be issued in limited numbers, with new art and introductions.

headline.main: Early Stephen King Novels to Be Reissued in Special Editions
